metadata.description: Beginning with Vampirella #1 and Red Sonja #1, Dynamite scoured the internet for the best cosplayers in all of fandom! Now, a select group is presented here in their very own comic featuring those covers! Included are: Vera Bambi, Cervena Fox, Joanie Brosas, Ireland Reid, Deanna Davis, and more! Bonus: Sheena cosplay by Ashley Du!
metadata.name: Dynamite 2017 Cosplay Cover Special
